install.name: Catmap - Show Category contents on a Map
install.author: Mick Buckley
install.description:
Uses JQuery to plot the contents of a Joomla Category on a Map. Each content item can specify co-ordinates and a CSS class to control its location and icon on the map (the default class is 'catmapicon', see catmap.css for more details). A popup showing the content item Intro Text is displayed when the map icon is rolled-over (can be disabled using a plugin parameter). Clicking the map icon displays the content item (can be disabled using a plugin parameter). Plugin syntax is {catmap , , , }. Note: THIS PLUGIN REQUIRES YOU TO ADD PARAMETERS TO THE FILE
administrator/components/com_content/models/article.xml
The new parameters belong within the section params group="advanced" The new parameters can be found in the file add_to_article.xml in this directory.

param.name: rollover_popup
param.label: Roll-over map icon to display Intro Text popup?
param.description: By default hovering over each map icon displays the item's Intro Text in a popup.

param.name: click_through
param.label: Click map icon to display content item?
param.description: By default each map icon privides a link to its content item. Clicking the icon displays the content item.
